articles.author: Daisy Chung, Ernest Scheyder, Clare Trainor
articles.description: A vast treasure of critical minerals lies on the ocean floor. Should they be extracted to help fight climate change?
articles.title: The promise and risks of deep-sea mining

articles.author: Stephen Nellis
articles.description: Microsoft (MSFT.O) on Wednesday announced a duo of custom-designed computing chips, joining other big tech firms that - faced with the high cost of delivering artificial intelligence services - are bringing key technologies in-house.
articles.title: Microsoft introduces its own chips for AI, with eye on cost

articles.author: Svea Herbst-Bayliss
articles.description: ValueAct Capital has built a large stake in Walt Disney (DIS.N) and sees room for the media and entertainment giant's stock price to roughly double, people familiar with the investment firm's thinking said on Wednesday.
articles.title: ValueAct builds stake in Disney, adds drama at home of Mickey Mouse -sources

articles.author: Howard Schneider
articles.description: With gas prices and airfares falling it will be cheaper for Americans to get to Grandma's or wherever they celebrate Thanksgiving this year, and when they arrive they'll find another happy price shock: The turkey and sides will cost less than last year.
articles.title: More peas please? Thanksgiving meal costs Americans less this year

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: NATO will replace its ageing fleet of AWACS surveillance planes, in service since the Cold War in the 1980s, with a militarised version of the Boeing 737 commercial jet, the alliance said on Wednesday, in a deal likely worth billions of euros.
articles.title: NATO to replace AWACS surveillance jets with modified Boeing 737

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: The U.S. health regulator's staff on Wednesday flagged concerns that data on Merck's (MRK.N) chronic cough drug might not be enough to prove the treatment's meaningful benefit, documents released ahead of a meeting of independent experts showed.
articles.title: US FDA staff flags concerns on Merck's chronic cough drug

articles.author: Helen Coster
articles.description: The percentage of TikTok users who regularly access news via the app rose to 43% in 2023 from 22% a year earlier, according to a new study from the Pew Research Center, which found half of U.S. adults get at least some news from social media.
articles.title: More TikTok users turning to the app for news, Pew study shows

articles.author: Nidal Al-Mughrabi
articles.description: The Israeli military said it was carrying out an operation against Hamas in the Gaza Strip's Al Shifa hospital on Wednesday and urged all members of the militant group in the hospital to surrender.
articles.title: Israel raids Gaza's Al Shifa Hospital

articles.author: Trevor Hunnicutt
articles.description: U.S. President Joe Biden meets Chinese leader Xi Jinping for the first time in a year on Wednesday, for talks that may ease friction between the adversarial superpowers on military conflicts, drug-trafficking and artificial intelligence.
articles.title: Biden, Xi meet as US-China military, economic tensions grind on

articles.author: Sruthi Shankar, Amruta Khandekar
articles.description: U.S. stocks extended gains on Wednesday, as fresh inflation data supported views that the Federal Reserve may be done with raising interest rates, while Target surged on an upbeat holiday-quarter forecast.
articles.title: Wall St edges higher on easing producer prices, Target's upbeat forecast
